title: Freud: the hidden nature of man
creator_credit: George Kaczender, John Kemeny and International Cinemedia Centre
brief_description: Dramatizes Freud’s background, his personal struggles, and his revolutionary theories which established a new view of man. Discusses the power of the unconscious, the Oedipus complex, dream analysis, and the human personality.
creator_credit_for_label: George Kaczender, John Kemeny and International Cinemedia Centre
